# tern-webidl

TernJS definition based on WebIDL from Mozilla Firefox

## Installation

Use npm install, take Vim for example:

    cd .vim/bundle/tern_for_vim
    npm i tern-webidl

Then add `ecma6`, `webidl` in `.tern-project` lib part:

    {
      "libs": [
        "ecma6",
        "webidl"
      ]
    }
